title: Grab this 3BR Enormous Apt ASAP!
map_address: Broadway near Amsterdam Avenue and Broadway
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 303293375', 'Rent: $3,800 / Month', 'Beds: 3', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 08/01/2022', 'Pet: Negotiable', 'Incredible 3 bedroom with Washer/Dryer in beautiful renovated apartment.', ' Great lighting throughout the apartment.', ' All 3 bedrooms are queen-sized with one possible being king-sized.', ' Kitchen comes with dishwasher and stainless steel appliances.', '- Near 1 and A Train', '- Dishwasher', '- Washer/Dryer in Unit', '- Hardwood floors', '- Natural Lighting', '- Renovated', '- Elevator in Building', '"Areas of Interest: City College, Columbia University, Columbia Medical Center, Harlem Public, Riverbank State Park, Hudson River."', 'Hamilton Heights is beautiful, wedged between the Hudson River to the west and St. Nicholas Park to the east, this is a neighborhood of hilly parks, museums and beautiful old brownstones.', "Walking distance to City College, easily access Columbia University or Columbia Medical Center and don't forget to take advantage of RiversState Park with it's state of the athletic facilities while you're at it!", 'Do not hesitate on this very spacious apartment!', 'Will not be around for long.', ' For more information Contact Gary Jimenez at 332-234-8385 or email Gary@Crosstown.', 'NYC', 'FEATURES', 'Elevator', 'Live In Super']
